main.name: UKAOBASI CALLISTUS
main.description: I'm a software engineer. I'm a pro at building fantastic desktop and web applications, as well as everything in between.
main.bio: A highly experienced Software engineer , Leader,  with over 4 years of developing and managing web projects from inception to delivery. An acute understanding of the development process and methodologies to improve productivity and efficiencies within a cross-functional environment. Proven track record of launching successful web projects with a 'Customer First' mindset.
